sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>It helps to set existing entity filter type as condition builder</description> <name>Update existing entity filters type</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var grEntityFilter = new GlideRecord('sn_grc_enrichment_query'); grEntityFilter.setValue('entity_filter_type', 'condition_builder'); grEntityFilter.setWorkflow(false); grEntityFilter.updateMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-06-21 11:19:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5398d77a533470105468ddeeff7b12ba</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update existing entity filters type</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5398d77a533470105468ddeeff7b12ba</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-07-21 02:57:34</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
